input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product name information.

Product name:
Life is good Women's Snuggle Low Cut Stripes Socks

Product keywords:
Great for keeping your feet warm
Polyester, Spandex
Imported
The Playmakers Foundation uses play therapy to aid kids who have experienced trauma in their lives
Small Life is good label at the top of each pair
One size fits most
Company donates 10% of its annual net profits to their non-profit The Playmakers Foundation

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Keep your feet warm with these Life is good Snuggle low cut stripes socks. The Playmakers Foundation uses play therapy to aid kids who have experienced trauma in their lives. Company donates 10% of its annual net profits to their non-profit. The small Life is good label is at the top of each pair. The socks are made of polyester and spandex. One size fits most. Imported.
input_text.Response B: These comfy, ultra-soft women's striped Life is good socks are great for keeping your feet warm. Made of a polyester, spandex blend, these socks are imported and feature the Life is good Playmakers Foundation logo at the top of each pair. The Playmakers Foundation uses play therapy to aid kids who have experienced trauma in their lives. These socks are one size fits most and are the perfect addition to any casual outfit. Life is good donates 10% of its annual net profits to The Playmakers Foundation, helping kids who have experienced trauma in their lives through the power of play.
